attributes.action: Make SEN Statements Compulsory after diagnosis
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: After a child has been identified with learning disabilities, autism, ADHD or other problems that will make difficulty for them to learn, they should have a COMPULSORY STATEMENT Plan  written straigh away. The STATEMENT PLAN first should provide the choices make by parents how they want their child be educate, training for parents, and therapy for children without delay. COMPULSORY STATEMENT after diagnosis could improve meet the children needs with less burden.

government_responses.details:
